archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Track Customer Order
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Undertake necessary tracking of the execution process. Modify the customer order status. Monitor the jeopardy status of customer orders, escalating customer orders as necessary. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use.
